import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-card.css' import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id,title,city,photo,price, featured, reviews}=tour; const {totalRating,avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return (
{ featured && Featured}
{city} {avgRating === 0 ? null :avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ('Not rated'):( ({reviews.length}) )}
{title}
${price} /per person
) } export default TourCard
